TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserMapPath extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Configuration.IConfigMapPath

Docs.summary: Maps configuration file virtual paths to physical paths.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Configuration.ConfigurationFileMap fileMap) cil managed

Docs.param: The configuration file mapping for the machine configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetAppPathForPath (string siteID, string path);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetAppPathForPath(string siteID, string path) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique identifier for the site.
The URL that is associated with the site.
Docs.summary: Returns the virtual directory name that is associated with a specific site.
Docs.returns: The value must be unique. The value distinguishes sites that have the same name.

Docs.param: The name of the default site.
A unique identifier for the site.
Docs.summary: Populates the default site name and the site ID.

Docs.param: A unique identifier for the site.
The URL that is associated with the site.
The physical path of the configuration file.
The name of the configuration file.
Docs.summary: Populates the directory and name of the configuration file based on the site ID and site path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetRootWebConfigFilename() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the physical path of the configuration file that is at the Web application root.
Docs.returns: The physical path of the Web.config file at the Web application root.

MemberSignature.Value: public string MapPath (string siteID, string path);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string MapPath(string siteID, string path) cil managed

Docs.param: A unique identifier for the site.
The URL that is associated with the site.
Docs.summary: Returns the physical path based on the site ID and on the URL that is associated with the site.
Docs.returns: The physical path of the site.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ResolveSiteArgument (string siteArgument, out string siteName, out string siteID);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveSiteArgument(string siteArgument, string siteName, string siteID) cil managed

Docs.param: The site name or site identifier.
A unique identifier for the site.
Docs.summary: Populates the site name and site ID based on a site argument value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `siteArgument` is `null`, or is equal to the default site name, or is equal to the default site identifier, the `siteName` and `siteID` values are populated with the default site values.
